column3: These instructions are already obsolete and won't work.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/7585a95a6fabafbf5ac8e0b6be4962040343d9c0 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu

@luke-jr I've only built on Linux which is 10x easier. I'm starting up a clean VM to try this out. \nCan you point out what portions are wrong, or perhaps any resources? I'm flying blind, but I think this is needed.  \n
git master uses autoconf to build now, not make+qmake.\n

```
Should build guides replace all the current build notes?
```

Yes. Let's not add more documents. If you have better build instructions for Windows, just replace the current ones.

Thanks for the initiative, but indeed it needs to be updated for autoconf.
Many parts are actually still relevant. I believe 3, 3.2, 3.3, 3.4, 4.4, 4.5, 4.6 need updating though.\n
Thanks @sipa and @luke-jr that gives me some direction. Noted @laanwj \n
